update_larva_groups

larvaworld.cli.argparser.update_larva_groups(lgs, N=None, mIDs=None, dIDs=None, sample=None)[source]

Modifies the experiment's configuration larvagroups :param sample: The reference dataset :param lgs: The existing larvagroups in the experiment configuration :param N: Overwrite the number of agents per larva group :param mIDs: Overwrite the larva models used in the experiment.If not None a larva group per model ID will be simulated. :param dIDs: The displayed ids of the groups. If None the model IDs (mIDs) are used

Returns:

The experiment's configuration larvagroups
